message: "Tumblr announced this week that it will begin enforcing a site-wide pornography ban starting Dec. 17. The blogging and social sharing platform arrived at the decision after the Tumblr app was removed from the App Store for having graphic depictions of child sexual abuse on its site."

data.description: Tumblr announced this week that it will begin enforcing a site-wide pornography ban starting Dec. 17. The blogging and social sharing platform arrived at the decision after the Tumblr app was removed from the App Store for having graphic depictions of child sexual abuse on its site.
data.title: Tumblr Bans Porn Following Disturbing Discovery
